enhanced_description: Psychometrica is an online psychometric assessment portal, established in 1995, that guides clients through their people management journey. As a premium brand specializing in international psychometric assessments covering a wide range of fields, it supports the entire employee lifecycle. Its services include pre-employment screening and selection, employee profiling to identify strengths, weaknesses, and development needs, talent retention strategies, and insights for training, development, and promotion decisions. This helps companies minimize attrition and make better, data-driven decisions for talent management.
